question: web sites that have receipes for every day foods?
question_content: web sites that have receipes for every day foods?

answers.answer_content:
I love this site for any kind of recipes
http://allrecipes.com/

I have found that BBC food has got great ideas for everyday foods.  You can search for recipes depending on the ingredients, the cookery programme or the chef.  There is so much choice that you will have something for everyday for the rest of your life.
www.bbc.co.uk/food

my favorite is kraftfoods.com you can choose to find recipes that are quick and easy, low fat, extra vitamins, diabetic, etc...they also have a weight loss program on that site too where you can input your goals and what fitness level you are currently and they give you meal idea as well as exercise ideas.

www.foodnetwork.com 
Rachael Ray has 30 min. meals on here 

there is also www.weightwatchers.com

ENJOY !!!!
www.bhg.com (better homes and gardens).  They have a great website and recipes and more. check it out.
